name: Multi-Target RRC Connection Re-Establishment
summary: The Multi-Target RRC Connection Re-Establishment feature extends the RRC Connection

parameters.name: Rrc.t301
parameters.description: See MOM description.

parameters.name: Rrc.t304
parameters.description: See MOM description.

parameters.name: RlfProfile.t310
parameters.description: See MOM description.

parameters.name: Rrc.t311
parameters.description: See MOM description.

parameters.name: ENodeBFunction.tS1HoCancelTimer
parameters.description: See MOM description.

parameters.name: ENodeBFunction.tRelocOverall
parameters.description: See MOM description.

parameters.name: ENodeBFunction.rrcConnReestActive
parameters.description: Indicates if the basic RRC Connection Re-establishment functionality is ACTIVATED                 or DEACTIVATED.

parameters.name: ENodeBFunction.mtRreWithoutNeighborActive
parameters.description: Enables or disables the RRC Connection Re-establishment in the source cell when                 there is no target neighbor cell information.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PROC_RRC_CONNECTION_RE_ESTABLISHMENT
parameters.description: The cause value sent in by the UE in the re-establishment                                     request

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PROC_RRC_CONNECTION_RE_ESTABLISHMENT
parameters.description: The outcome of the re-establishment procedure

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PROC_RRC_CONNECTION_RE_ESTABLISHMENT
parameters.description: TTI Bundling mode of the UE after the RRC Connection                                     Re-Establishment is completed.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PROC_RRC_CONNECTION_RE_ESTABLISHMENT
parameters.description: Time Alignment for UE.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PROC_RRC_CONNECTION_RE_ESTABLISHMENT
parameters.description: Result of re-establishing the bearers of the UE.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PROC_UE_CTXT_FETCH
parameters.description: The result of the Context Fetch.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PROC_UE_CTXT_FETCH
parameters.description: Describes what procedure was ongoing for the UE when the context                                     fetch request was received.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PROC_UE_CTXT_FETCH
parameters.description: If the ongoing procedure is handover, this parameter describes                                     which type of handover.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PROC_UE_CTXT_FETCH
parameters.description: If the ongoing procedure is handover, this parameter describes                                     the target type for the handover.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PROC_UE_CTXT_FETCH
parameters.description: Indicates if the HO is an SRVCC and the type of SRVCC.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PROC_UE_CTXT_FETCH
parameters.description: When the ongoing procedure is RRC Connection Reconfiguration,                                     this parameter describes the cause of RRC Connection                                     Reconfiguration.                                     EVENT_PARAM_UE_CTXT_FETCH_DURING_RRC_RECONF_CAUSE

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PROC_UE_CTXT_FETCH
parameters.description: Indicates if target cell has an                                         ExternalEUtranCellFDD or an                                         ExternalEUtranCellTDD relation in the                                     source cell.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PROC_UE_CTXT_FETCH
parameters.description: Re-establishment cause received in RRC Connection                                     Re-establishment message

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PROC_UE_CTXT_FETCH
parameters.description: UE identity in RRE target cell.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PROC_UE_CTXT_FETCH
parameters.description: EVENT_PARAM_UE_CTXT_FETCH_DURING_RRC_RECONF_CAUSEIndicates if the event is generated by the UE Context Fetch or                                     the Retrieve UE Context procedure.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PROC_UE_CTXT_FETCH
parameters.description: Determines if the event is generated for an EN-DC configured                                     UE.

parameters.name: X2_CONTEXT_FETCH_REQUEST
parameters.description: Sent when a context fetch request is sent or received, either                                     from another UE context in the same eNodeB, or in an                                     X2AP:PRIVATE MESSAGE from another Ericsson eNodeB.

parameters.name: X2_CONTEXT_FETCH_RESPONSE
parameters.description: Sent when a context fetch response is sent or received, either                                     from another UE context in the same eNodeB, or in an                                     X2AP:PRIVATE MESSAGE from another Ericsson eNodeB.

parameters.name: X2_CONTEXT_FETCH_RESPONSE_ACCEPT
parameters.description: Sent when a context fetch response accept is sent or received,                                     either from another UE context in the same eNodeB, or in an                                     X2AP:PRIVATE MESSAGE from another Ericsson eNodeB.

parameters.name: RRC_RRC_CONNECTION_RE_ESTABLISHMENT_REQUEST
parameters.description: Sent when an RRC:RRCConnectionReestablishmentRequest is received                                     from the UE.

parameters.name: RRC_RRC_CONNECTION_RE_ESTABLISHMENT_REJECT
parameters.description: Sent when an RRC:RRCConnectionReestablishmentReject is received                                     from the UE.

parameters.name: RRC_CONNECTION_RE_ESTABLISHMENT
parameters.description: Sent when an RRC:RRCConnectionReestablishment is sent to the                                     UE.

parameters.name: RRC_CONNECTION_RE_ESTABLISHMENT_COMPLETE
parameters.description: Sent when an RRC:RRCConnectionReestablishmentComplete is received                                     from the UE.

parameters.name: X2_RETRIEVE_UE_CONTEXT_REQUEST
parameters.description: A Retrieve UE Context Request X2 message was sent or                                     received.

parameters.name: X2_RETRIEVE_UE_CONTEXT_RESPONSE
parameters.description: A Retrieve UE Context Response X2 message was sent or                                     received.

parameters.name: X2_RETRIEVE_UE_CONTEXT_FAILURE
parameters.description: A Retrieve UE Context Failure X2 message was sent or                                     received.

parameters.name: X2_DATA_FORWARDING_ADDRESS_INDICATION
parameters.description: A Data Forwarding Address Indication X2 message was sent or                                     received.

parameters.name: For non-Ericsson MME
parameters.description: The X2 Handover triggered is to be used. Set the ENodeBFunction.zzzTemporary52 parameter to 1.

parameters.name: X2_RETRIEVE_UE_CONTEXT_REQUEST
parameters.description: A Retrieve UE Context Request X2 message is                                         sent or received.

parameters.name: X2_RETRIEVE_UE_CONTEXT_RESPONSE
parameters.description: A Retrieve UE Context Response X2 message is                                         sent or received.

parameters.name: X2_RETRIEVE_UE_CONTEXT_FAILURE
parameters.description: A Retrieve UE Context Failure X2 message is                                         sent or received.

parameters.name: X2_DATA_FORWARDING_ADDRESS_INDICATION
parameters.description: A Data Forwarding Address Indication X2                                         message is sent or received.

activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011366 MO instance.
deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011366 MO instance.
